field.name: summary
field.value: ListResolver breaks with multiple interceptors of the same type

field.name: description

comment.author: bling
comment.text: ArrayResolver works fine, and what I'm using as a replacement.

comment.author: bling
comment.text: Turned out to be a trivial null reference check. Patch with test case attached.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
